title: Better in Time - Novel Updates
author: Wu Chu Ke Tao   无处可逃
description:
I never thought this life as beautiful,

Until when I met you –

Four years ago, a fatal misunderstanding led Xiao Zhiyuan and San Zijin have this marriage in name only.

With them living under one roof, raising a daughter together,

Though in close proximity, each other’s heart seemed across the horizon.

He obviously loves, but can only keep watch from near distance,

She clearly said to hate, but never really choose to hurt.

The past will dawn one day, they will eventually know each other’s position in their heart.

All beautiful things start when I encounter you.>
